parameters.query:
INSERT INTO matches (external_id, league_season_id, home_team_id, away_team_id, match_date, round, status, score_home, score_away)
VALUES (
  {{ $json.external_id }},
  (SELECT ls.id FROM league_seasons ls
   JOIN leagues l ON l.id = ls.league_id
   JOIN seasons s ON s.id = ls.season_id
   WHERE l.external_id = {{ $json.league_id }}
   AND s.year = {{ $json.season }}),
  (SELECT id FROM teams WHERE external_id = {{ $json.home_team_external_id }}),
  (SELECT id FROM teams WHERE external_id = {{ $json.away_team_external_id }}),
  '{{ $json.match_date }}',
  '{{ $json.round }}',
  '{{ $json.status }}',
  {{ $json.score_home }},
  {{ $json.score_away }}
)
ON CONFLICT (external_id) DO UPDATE SET
  status = EXCLUDED.status,
  score_home = EXCLUDED.score_home,
  score_away = EXCLUDED.score_away
